A:TEMPE-AZ-EXAMPLE-7750-01# show router static-route tag 1000

A:TEMPE-AZ-EXAMPLE-7750-01# show router static-route tag 1000 ipv6

===============================================================================

   Next Hop                                    Interface                   
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

   n/a                                         n/a

   n/a                                         n/a

   n/a                                         n/a

   n/a                                         n/a
